DOC.brief_summary: A nutrition-focused QIP implement standard care select branch home health division health care system . The QIP comprise two group patient , Group 1 consist hospitalize , at-risk/malnourished patient discharge home health , Group 2 consist outpatient at-risk/malnourished patient enrol home health . Both group follow 90 day post enrollment . The QIP group compare historical control , concurrent control , match concurrent control across site within health system .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Nutrition Quality Improvement Program Outcomes Malnourished Patients
DOC.criteria: Admitted home health within healthcare system 's hospital outpatient clinic Patient screen positive malnutrition hospital stay and/or home health nutrition screen tool upon enrollment home health Patient able consume food beverages orally physician indicated otherwise Enrollment home health Skilled Nursing facility ( SNF ) hospital outpatient clinic affiliate healthcare system Patient pregnant Patient intubate , receive tube feed parenteral nutrition Patient severe dementia delirium History significant psychiatric disorder Any disorder may interfere QIP product consumption compliance QIP protocol procedure per admit clinician Subject state allergy intolerance ONS ingredients Patients receive hospice care
